pageContext.claim: “They're extremely complex. People wouldn't understand them. They're done by among the biggest and best law firms in the country. Same thing with the accounting firms. … They do these things; they put them in. But people don't understand tax returns.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump's tax returns may be longer than the average, but they would show how much Trump paid in taxes, what his effective tax rate was, where his income came from, and other easily understandable information.
